chanel.title: WildTrails : New Events
chanel.description: Notifications About New Events That We Offer

item.title: Mountain Adventure Hike
item.description: The iconic Geirangerfjord is known for its spectacular waterfalls and deserted fjord farms high up on the steep cliffsides.

item.title: Sunset Hike
item.description: Sogndal Skiresort Hodlekve has a 1200 meter long ski lift, who takes you up about 290 meters and have 4 possible downhills. 3,5 km of prepered hills is waiting for you!

item.title: Peak Hike Challenge
item.description: Trolltunga is the most spectacular rock formation in Norway.

item.title: Local Hike
item.description: Experience the Vøringsfossen waterfall - the most famous waterfall in Norway!

item.title: Morning Mountain Spin
item.description: Even though the monastery is gone, the history is still alive.

item.title: Mountain Bike Challenge
item.description: Several of the world's best climbers have already visited Strøm in Flatanger to climb what is referred to as one of the most difficult climbing routes in the world.

item.title: Countryside Bike Ride
item.description: See the cannons (they had a firing range of 12 km) and other interesting exhibits from World War II at the outport of Ny-Hellesund.

item.title: Rural Trail Adventure
item.description: Lindesnes Lighthouse is Norway's southernmost point on land.

item.title: Local Kayak Trip
item.description: To experience the starry, limitless sky, and the unbelievable colours that move across the Arctic sky, few places on earth offer more ways to witness the northern lights than Norway.

item.title: River Canyon Kayak Tour
item.description: Imagine strolling through wild flower meadows under the midnight sun, surrounded by tranquil fjords and mountain peaks as tall as 1,800 metres.

item.title: River Kayak Adventure
item.description: Imagine strolling through wild flower meadows under the midnight sun, surrounded by tranquil fjords and mountain peaks as tall as 1,800 metres.

item.title: Lake Kayak Trip
item.description: Imagine strolling through wild flower meadows under the midnight sun, surrounded by tranquil fjords and mountain peaks as tall as 1,800 metres.
